5232.last_action: Read second time. To third reading.
5232.title: Local government: property-related fees.
5232.description: A resolution to propose to the people of the State of California an amendment to the Constitution of the State, by amending Section 6 of Article XIII D thereof, relating to local government finance.

5233.title: State and local finance reform.
5233.description: A resolution to propose to the people of the State of California an amendment to the Constitution of the State, by amending Sections 8 and 9 of Article II thereof, by amending Sections 8, 10, and 12 of Article IV thereof, by amending Sections 24 and 25.5 of Article XIII thereof, by amending Section 3 of Article XIII A thereof, by adding Section 17 to Article XI thereof, by adding Section 21 to Article XVI thereof, and by adding Section 3.5 to Article XVIII thereof, relating to state and local finance.

5234.last_action: To Coms. on RLS. and E., R., & C.A.
5234.title: Legislature: public notice of bills.
5234.description: A resolution to propose to the people of the State of California an amendment to the Constitution of the State, by amending Section 8 of Article IV thereof, relating to the Legislature.

5237.last_action: From print. May be acted upon on or after July 24.
5237.title: Food safety: antibiotics.
5237.description: A resolution to propose to the people of the State of California an amendment to the Constitution of the State, by adding Article X C thereto, relating to food safety.

5238.last_action: From print. May be acted upon on or after August 23.
5238.title: Legislature: term limits.
5238.description: A resolution to propose to the people of the State of California an amendment to the Constitution of the State, by amending Section 2 of, and adding Section 2.5 to, Article IV thereof, and by amending Section 7 of Article XX thereof, relating to the Legislature.

5239.last_action: From print. May be acted upon on or after September 24.
5239.title: Legislature: revised biennial sessions and part-time
5239.description: A resolution to propose to the people of the State of California an amendment to the Constitution of the State, by amending Section 8 of Article III thereof, by amending, repealing, and adding Sections 3, 7, 7.5, 8, 10, 11, and 12 of Article IV thereof, by amending, repealing, and adding Section 6 of Article XIX thereof, and by amending, repealing, and adding Section 1 of Article XIX A thereof, relating to the Legislature.

5240.last_action: Set, second hearing. Failed passage in committee. (Ayes 2. Noes 2. Page 3296.) Reconsideration granted.
5240.title: University of California: mandatory systemwide fees.
5240.description: A resolution to propose to the people of the State of California an amendment to the Constitution of the State, by amending Section 9 of Article IX thereof, relating to the University of California.

5241.last_action: Returned to Secretary of Senate pursuant to Joint Rule 62(a). (Page 3603.)
5241.title: Death penalty appeals: transfer.
5241.description: A resolution to propose to the people of the State of California an amendment to the Constitution of the State, by amending Section 12 of Article VI thereof, relating to death penalty appeals.

5244.last_action: From committee with author's amendments. Read second time. Amended. Re-referred to Com. on RLS.
5244.title: Legislature: bill notice requirements.
5244.description: A resolution to propose to the people of the State of California an amendment to the Constitution of the State, by amending Section 8 of Article IV thereof, relating to the Legislature.

5245.last_action: To Coms. on REV. & TAX. and E., R., & C.A.
5245.title: Property taxation: intercounty base year value transfers.
5245.description: A resolution to propose to the people of the State of California an amendment to the Constitution of the State, by amending subdivision (a) of Section 2 of Article XIII A thereof, relating to taxation.

5246.last_action: From print. May be acted upon on or after June 5.
5246.title: Legislature: Budget Bill: passage requirements.
5246.description: A resolution to propose to the people of the State of California an amendment to the Constitution of the State, by amending Section 12 of Article IV thereof, relating to the Legislature.
